subtitleNullable: This is a dataset for the purpose of building a face mask detector.
descriptionNullable:
First, I would like to thank @prasoonkottarathil for the original [dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/prasoonkottarathil/face-mask-lite-dataset).

This dataset is an edited version, with smaller images (224 × 224 instead of 1024 × 1024 for the purpose of feeding it into MobileNetV2) that were converted to grayscale.

The inspiration was to create a face mask detector in order help identify people who need to take more precautionary actions in these difficult times with Coronavirus.

My partner @luka77 and I have accomplished this task. Our GitHub repository can be found [here](https://github.com/jp-singaraju/Face-Mask-Detection).
title: Facemask Detection Dataset 20,000 Images
subtitle: This is a dataset for the purpose of building a face mask detector.
description:
First, I would like to thank @prasoonkottarathil for the original [dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/prasoonkottarathil/face-mask-lite-dataset).

This dataset is an edited version, with smaller images (224 × 224 instead of 1024 × 1024 for the purpose of feeding it into MobileNetV2) that were converted to grayscale.

The inspiration was to create a face mask detector in order help identify people who need to take more precautionary actions in these difficult times with Coronavirus.

My partner @luka77 and I have accomplished this task. Our GitHub repository can be found [here](https://github.com/jp-singaraju/Face-Mask-Detection).
